DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect lidocaine antiarrhythmic dosage postoperative cognitive dysfunction supratentorial craniotomy .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lidocaine Antiarrhythmic Dosage Postoperative Cognitive Dysfunction Supratentorial Craniotomy Dysfunction Supratentorial Craniotomy
DOC.criteria: 1860 year old , ASA physical status I II , BMI < 30 Scheduled elective supratentorial craniotomy MMSE < 24 operation Cooperative give inform consent person History mental psychiatric disorder Contraindicated internal jugular venous catheterization Pregnant lactate female History systemic malignant tumor diabetes Previously treat protocol participate another study within previous 30 day Suspected history allergic reaction intolerance amide anesthetic agent study History alcohol abuse and/or drug abuse within previous one year History family history malignant hyperthermia
